bug.author: treo
bug.summary: build-dl4j-stack.sh has some issues on msys2
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/build-dl4j-stack.sh#L96>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/build-dl4j-stack.sh#L96</denchmark-link>
When run in an msys2 terminal without any parameters, the CHIP variable stays empty, and therefore ndj4-cuda isn't excluded from the build and it fails. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/build-dl4j-stack.sh#L272>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/build-dl4j-stack.sh#L272</denchmark-link>
needs " around the variable I didn't have time to fix and test the changes, so I'm filling an issue instead so it doesn't get lost

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
